name: The Legend of Dark Witch 2 （魔神少女エピソード２）
description: Created by indie games company INSIDE SYSTEM in 2014, The Legend of Dark Witch 2 is a 2D action story sequel to "The Legend of Dark Witch". True to its predecessor, Legend of the Dark Witch 2 retains its simple controls and enough challenges to satisfy the completist.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: WindowsXP 内存: 2 GB RAM 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows7 内存: 4 GB RAM 存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
